superHeroes.name: Awesome Man
superHeroes.line1: If I could be a Superhero,
superHeroes.line3: I'd fly around the world fighting crime,
superHeroes.line5: And if I saw criminals trying to lie
superHeroes.line6: Hurting other people and making them cry,
superHeroes.line7: I'd haul them off to jail in my Awesome Van.
superHeroes.line8: Because I would be Awesome Man.

superHeroes.name: Drug-Free Boy
superHeroes.line1: If I could be a Superhero,
superHeroes.line3: Telling the world of the evils of drugs,
superHeroes.line4: and the lives that they destroy.
superHeroes.line5: And all of the junkies getting so high
superHeroes.line6: With their needles and bongs and sticks made of thai
superHeroes.line7: I'd burn them alive and I would squeal with joy.
superHeroes.line8: Cause I would be Drug-Free Boy.

superHeroes.name: Immigration Dude
superHeroes.line1: If I could be a Superhero,
superHeroes.line3: I'd send all the foreigners back to their homes
superHeroes.line4: For eating up all of our food
superHeroes.line5: For taking our welfare and best jobs to boot
superHeroes.line6: Like landscaping, dishwashing, picking our fruit
superHeroes.line7: I'd pass lots of laws to get rid of their brood
superHeroes.line8: Because I would be Immigration Dude.

superHeroes.name: Justice Guy
superHeroes.line1: If you could be a Superhero,
superHeroes.line3: Making sure people get what they deserve,
superHeroes.line5: Like if a wife left her husband with three kids and no job
superHeroes.line6: To run off to f---ing Hawaii with some doctor named Bob
superHeroes.line7: You could skin them and drain them of blood til they die
superHeroes.line8: Then you would be Justice Guy

superHeroes.name: Stephen Lynch
superHeroes.line1: Or you could be subtle, I didn't mean to be vague
superHeroes.line2: Give her Mad Cow disease & let him die of the plague
superHeroes.line3: As long as they suffer for their terrible lie
superHeroes.line5: Then you would be Justice Guy.
superHeroes.line6: Then you would be a Superhero, like me.
